data.title: Debra Cramer Obituary - Doylestown, Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Debra L. Cramer of Perkasie, PA passed away suddenly on Wednesday, June 21, 2017.  She was 54.  Born in Bristol, PA Debbie resided in Chalfont and Doylestown, PA before moving to Perkasie, PA 6 years ago.  She was currently employed as a Registered Nurse with Southeastern Home Health of Colmar and Blue Bell, PA for 2 years.    Debbie was actively involved with Almost Home Dog Rescue of Doylestown, PA; enjoyed time at the NJ Shore; and spending time with her two grandsons.  She was the devoted mother of Samuel Joseph (Jake) Cramer and fiancé’ Jessica Blank, Marissa Leigh Cramer and Kelly Marie Cramer; beloved daughter of Joan (Rein) Stevens and the late Donald H. Stevens, Sr.; dear sister of Donald H. Stevens, Jr., James V. Stevens and wife Mary, and the late John C. Stevens; loving grandmother of Nicholas Blank and Bryson Cramer; cherished aunt of Jennifer Ashley Stevens; former wife of Samuel W. Cramer, Jr.; also survived by many family members of the Cramer family.  A celebration of life will be celebrated at UNO Chicago Grill, 1661 Easton Road, Warrington, PA 18976 on Saturday, July 22nd from 1:00-4:00 pm.  Cremation was private under the direction of the Varcoe-Thomas Funeral Home/Central Bucks Crematory, 344 North Main Street, Doylestown, PA 18901.  In lieu of flowers, memorial gifts to Almost Home Dog Rescue, PO Box 132, Doylestown, PA 18901 or www.almosthomedogrescue.rescuegroups.org/info/donate  Send condolences to www.varcoethomasfuneralhome.com
